venue.address_1: Snyder Auditorium, G-1 (Basement), Kresge Building, 677 Huntington Avenue
venue.name: Harvard School of Public Health

item.description:
Invited by HSPH China Initiative,
Minister SUN Zhigang, National Coordinator of Healthcare Reform of China
will visit HSPH and give a speech on
"China's Health Care Reforms: Progress and Problems"
on Friday afternoon, June 8th, from 3:00-4:00pm (refreshments following), 
in the Snyder Auditorium (G-1), basement amphitheater of the Kresge Building, 677 Huntington Avenue (near Brigham Circle and Longwood Avenue), Boston.

 

http://www.hsph.harvard.edu/china-initiative/index.html
item.how_to_find_us: Bring positive ID (e.g. local driver's license, current Harvard ID) to show to security guard to get in

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Minister SUN Zhigang, National Coordinator of Healthcare Reform of China, @HSP
